backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no functionality implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a single completed feature that changes navigation link text from 'top 10' to 'Standings' in the Navigation component.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration files for the Benning Bass Club application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark mode color schemes using OKLCH color space for the application theme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with basic meta tags, title 'Benning Bass Club', and script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component defining TanStack Router configuration with Layout wrapper, nine routes (home, join, schedule, gallery, info, links, about, contact, top10), and type-safe router setup.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Three-column footer component displaying club branding, quick links, social media connections, sponsor mention, and copyright with dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/Lightbox.tsx: Modal lightbox component for viewing gallery images with navigation arrows, keyboard controls (Escape, arrow keys), close button, and image counter.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky header navigation with desktop centered menu and mobile hamburger menu, featuring links to Home, Tournament Schedule, Standings, Photo Gallery, Merchandise, Facebook, and Join button.
frontend/src/data/tournaments.ts: Tournament data module exporting an array of 13 tournaments (Sep 2025 - Aug 2026) with date parsing utility that handles various date formats and converts them to Date objects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages an authenticated or anonymous actor for backend communication using Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAverageCatchSize.t: Hook that calculates the average big fish weight from hardcoded leaderboard data, filtering out entries without valid big fish measurements.
frontend/src/hooks/useFishScrollAnimatio: Hook that animates a fish element based on scroll position (fading in and floating up) and flips it horizontally every 2 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useImagePreloader.ts: Hook that preloads home page images on mount and caches the result globally to avoid redundant loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state and identity persistence with AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark mode color schemes using earth tones for a fishing/outdoor aesthetic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: About page displaying the Benning Bass Club's story, mission, values, and member information in a card-based layout.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page showing email, social media links, and club leadership information for the Benning Bass Club.
frontend/src/pages/Gallery.tsx: Photo gallery page displaying 8 fishing images in a responsive masonry grid layout with lightbox functionality for viewing full-size images.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Homepage featuring animated bass fish decorations, hero section with club logo and flag motifs, next tournament countdown, average catch size display, and call-to-action buttons for joining and viewing schedule.
frontend/src/pages/Info.tsx: Information hub page displaying club meeting schedules, rules and guidelines, membership requirements, and tournament information in organized card layouts with icons.
frontend/src/pages/Join.tsx: Membership interest form page collecting applicant information including name, email, phone, military affiliation, fishing experience, and boat ownership status.
frontend/src/pages/Links.tsx: Resource page organizing external links into categories: fishing regulations, local lakes, bass fishing resources, and local services like tackle shops and boat ramps.
frontend/src/pages/Merchandise.tsx: Empty merchandise page component with no content implemented.
frontend/src/pages/Schedule.tsx: Tournament schedule page displaying 2025-2026 tournament dates, lakes, ramps, and draw dates in a responsive table (desktop) and card layout (mobile).
frontend/src/pages/Top10.tsx: React component displaying a tournament leaderboard table with top 10 anglers, their weights, points, and catch details. Includes responsive design with desktop table view and mobile card view.
frontend/src/utils/tournamentHelpers.ts: Utility function that filters and returns the next upcoming tournament from an array of tournaments by comparing dates.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, Inter font family, custom animations, and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file indicating a pending feature request to change navigation link text from 'top 10' to 'Standings' in the navbar component.
